speaker: Leila
text: If I were more assertive, I would have shared my concerns during the sprint review.
ipa: ɪf aɪ wɚ mɔɹ əˈsɝtɪv, aɪ wʊd həv ʃɛɹd maɪ kənˈsɝnz ˈdʊɹɪŋ ðə spɹɪnt ɹɪˈvju
stress: If I were more ASSERTIVE, I would have SHARED my CONCERNS during the SPRINT REVIEW.
linking:
"would have" → /wʊd həv/ (d + h linking)
"shared my" → /ʃɛɹd maɪ/ (d + m linking)

speaker: Dan
text: I get it. If I felt more confident about my idea, I would have jumped in earlier too.
ipa: aɪ ɡɛt ɪt. ɪf aɪ fɛlt mɔɹ ˈkɑnfɪdənt əˈbaʊt maɪ aɪˈdiə, aɪ wʊd həv dʒʌmpt ɪn ˈɝliɚ tu
stress: I GET it. If I FELT more CONFIDENT about my IDEA, I would have JUMPED in EARLIER too.
linking:
"would have" → /wʊd həv/ (d + h linking)
"jumped in" → /dʒʌmpt ɪn/ (t + i linking)

speaker: Leila
text: Honestly, I froze. If I weren’t so afraid of being wrong, I might have challenged that plan properly.
ipa: ˈɑnəstli, aɪ fɹoʊz. ɪf aɪ wɚnt soʊ əˈfɹeɪd əv ˈbiɪŋ ɹɔŋ, aɪ maɪt həv ˈtʃælɪndʒd ðæt plæn ˈpɹɑpɚli
stress: HONESTLY, I FROZE. If I WEREN’T so AFRAID of being WRONG, I might have CHALLENGED that PLAN PROPERLY.
linking:
"might have" → /maɪt həv/ (t + h linking)
"challenged that" → /ˈtʃælɪndʒd ðæt/ (d + th linking)

speaker: Dan
text: It’s hard. If you had spoken up though, they probably would have listened — you made some great points afterward.
ipa: ɪts hɑɹd. ɪf ju hæd ˈspoʊkən ʌp ðoʊ, ðeɪ ˈpɹɑbəbli wʊd həv ˈlɪsənd — ju meɪd səm ɡɹeɪt pɔɪnts ˈæftɚwɚd
stress: It’s HARD. If you had SPOKEN UP though, they probably would have LISTENED — you MADE some GREAT POINTS AFTERWARD.
linking:
"had spoken" → /hæd ˈspoʊkən/ (d + s linking)
"would have" → /wʊd həv/ (d + h linking)

speaker: Leila
text: Thanks. But I keep thinking… if I were more experienced, I wouldn’t have hesitated so much.
ipa: θæŋks. bət aɪ kip ˈθɪŋkɪŋ… ɪf aɪ wɚ mɔɹ ɪkˈspɪɹiənst, aɪ ˈwʊdənt həv ˈhɛzəˌteɪtɪd soʊ mʌtʃ
stress: THANKS. But I KEEP THINKING… if I were more EXPERIENCED, I WOULDN’T have HESITATED so MUCH.
linking:
"wouldn’t have" → /ˈwʊdənt həv/ (t + h linking)
"hesitated so" → /ˈhɛzəˌteɪtɪd soʊ/ (d + s linking)

speaker: Dan
text: Don’t worry — that confidence comes with time. If I had known how supportive the PM would be, I would have raised the issue too.
ipa: doʊnt ˈwɜɹi — ðæt ˈkɑnfɪdəns kʌmz wɪð taɪm. ɪf aɪ hæd noʊn haʊ səˈpɔɹtɪv ðə piːɛm wʊd bi, aɪ wʊd həv ɹeɪzd ði ˈɪʃu tu
stress: DON’T WORRY — that CONFIDENCE comes with TIME. If I had KNOWN how SUPPORTIVE the PM would BE, I would have RAISED the ISSUE too.
linking:
"had known" → /hæd noʊn/ (d + n linking)
"would have" → /wʊd həv/ (d + h linking)
